values.label: Brand
values.name: %brand%
values.description: Product brand, must be consistent with licenses server

values.label: Company Id
values.name: %companyId%
values.description: Company name in lowercase without spaces. Only alphanumeric symbols are allowed.

values.label: VMS Name
values.name: %vmsName%
values.description: VMS name, which will be displayed to users

values.label: VMS Id
values.name: %vmsId%
values.description: VMS name, which will be used in the paths and settings keys

values.label: Client Protocol
values.name: %uriProtocol%
values.description: URL protocol for calling native clients from browser

values.label: EULA Version
values.name: %eulaVersion%
values.description: EULA version must be increased on each significant EULA change, so user will be forced to read and agree again.

values.label: Base distribution filename
values.name: %installerName%
values.description: Example: "nxwitness"

values.label: Custom Languages
values.name: %customLanguages%
values.description: Limit available languages to the following list

values.label: Custom url for the open source libraries
values.name: %customOpenSourceLibrariesUrl%
values.description: 3rd-party developers can override the built-in link if they add dependencies to some custom libraries

values.label: Company Web Page
values.name: %contact.companyUrl%
values.description: Example: "http://networkoptix.com"

values.label: Support address
values.name: %contact.supportAddress%
values.description: Depending on the selected channel, this can be web page or an email address or a phone number

values.label: Licensing address
values.name: %contact.licensingAddress%
values.description: Depending on the selected channel, this can be web page or an email address or a phone number

values.label: System Web Page - Home
values.name: %contact.systemWebPages.homePage%
values.description: On the clean install, this page will be added to the System Web Pages as "Home"

values.label: System Web Page - Support
values.name: %contact.systemWebPages.supportPage%
values.description: On the clean install, this page will be added to the System Web Pages as "Support"

values.label: Client Auto Updates
values.name: %desktop.clientAutoUpdates%
values.description: Allow desktop client auto-updates

values.label: Custom client flag
values.name: %desktop.customClient%
values.description: Mark the customization as custom (e.g. for open source based customizations); e.g. to prevent autoupdates

values.label: [MacOS] VMS Bundle Identifier
values.name: %desktop.macos.bundleIdentifier%
values.description: Unique bundle identifier. Only alphanumeric symbols are allowed. Should be in format: "com.companyName.ProductName"

values.label: [MacOS] Protocol Handler Bundle Identifier
values.name: %desktop.macos.protocolHandlerBundleIdentifier%
values.description: Unique bundle identifier. Only alphanumeric symbols are allowed. Should be in format: "com.companyName.ProductName.protocol_handler"

values.label: [MacOS] Sign Identity
values.name: %desktop.macos.signIdentity%
values.description: Example: "Developer ID Application: Network Optix, Inc. (L6FE34GJWM)"

values.label: [Mobile] Compatible customizations
values.name: %mobile.compatibleCustomizations%
values.description: Example: default_cn;default_zh_CN;metavms

values.label: [Android] package name
values.name: %mobile.android.packageName%
values.description: Unique package identifier. Only lowercase alphanumeric symbols are allowed. Should be in format: "com.companyName.productname"

values.label: [Android] Baidu API key
values.name: %mobile.android.baidu.apiKey%
values.description: Used for push notifications support in China

values.label: [Android] Baidu application title
values.name: %mobile.android.baidu.displayName%
values.description: Application title for Baidu version of the mobile client

values.label: [Android] Compatibility app package
values.name: %mobile.android.compatibilityPackage%
values.description: Package Id for the VMS 2.4 and older

values.label: [iOS] Short Display Name
values.name: %mobile.ios.bundleName%
values.description: Must be not longer than [Mobile] Application Title

values.label: [iOS] Sign Identity
values.name: %mobile.ios.signIdentity%
values.description: Example: "iPhone Distribution: Network Optix, Inc. (L6FE34GJWM)"

values.label: WebAdmin Logo
values.name: desktop/webadmin_logo.png
values.description: Will be displayed on the server web page

values.label: Email Logo
values.name: desktop/email_logo.png
values.description: Will be displayed in the server's emails

values.label: Intro image (exclusive with intro video)
values.name: desktop/intro.png
values.description: Displayed on the login dialog

values.label: Intro video (exclusive with intro image)
values.name: desktop/intro.mkv
values.description: Displayed on the login dialog

values.label: [Windows] Installer background
values.name: desktop/windows/installer_background.png
values.description: Bottom left corner must be while as image takes only a part of the background
